name: Skill Converter Agent
description: Directory-first converter for transforming a generic skill into a Skill-Runner AutoSkill package.

prompts.gemini: Use skill `skill-converter-agent` in directory-first mode. If `source_type=directory`, convert in place using `source_dir={{ parameter.source_skill_path }}`. If `source_type=zip`, first run `zip_directory_wrapper.py --mode unpack` to a workspace directory, then run the same directory conversion logic, then optionally repack via `--mode pack`. Apply prompt-based classification and conversion. Always run final validator `validate_converted_skill.py`. Respect `mode={{ parameter.mode }}`, `target_skill_id={{ parameter.target_skill_id }}`, `default_engine={{ parameter.default_engine }}`, `strict={{ parameter.strict }}`, `emit_zip={{ parameter.emit_zip }}`. Return only final JSON.
